line.text: Thy bosom is endeared with all hearts
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which I by lacking have supposed dead
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And there reigns love and all love loving parts
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And all those friends which I thought buried
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How many a holy and obsequious tear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hath dear religious love stoln from mine eye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As interest of the dead which now appear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But things removed that hidden in thee lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou art the grave where buried love doth live
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hung with the trophies of my lovers gone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who all their parts of me to thee did give
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That due of many now is thine alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Their images I loved I view in thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And thou (all they) hast all the all of me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
